about_the_game:
Containing all the essential information on the game including basic controls, flight and weapon control as well as understanding the interface and player stats.

The files can be found within the game's local folder. This can be accessed by right-clicking on the game within the Steam Libary, then selecting 'Manage' and 'Browse local files'.
detailed_description:
Containing all the essential information on the game including basic controls, flight and weapon control as well as understanding the interface and player stats.

The files can be found within the game's local folder. This can be accessed by right-clicking on the game within the Steam Libary, then selecting 'Manage' and 'Browse local files'.

name: The Falconeer - Game Manual

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF viewer

short_description: Containing all the essential information on the game including basic controls, flight and weapon control as well as understanding the interface and player stats.
supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian
